Resistance.help: Dire Wolves are resistant to Placate and Confuse effects as well as cold, lethal and smashing damage. They also have a minor amount of defense to Melee, Ranged and AoE attacks.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto: +Res(Placate, Confuse, Taunt, Cold, Lethal, Smash) +Def(Melee, Ranged, AoE)

Vicious_Bite.help: The beast delivers a quick bite to their target causing Light Lethal damage and Minor Lethal damage over time. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast
Vicious_Bite.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Vicious_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Wild_Charge.help: The beast breaks into a sprint that boosts damage dealt for the next few seconds. While Wild Charge is in effect the beast will move much faster than normal and be resistant to slow effects. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} begins a {PowerName} boosting their damage and movement speed.

Chilling_Howl.help: The Dire Wolf lets out a concentrated, but narrow blast of arctic air that chills foes causing Moderate Cold damage and additional lingering Cold damage as well as reducing the target's movement and attack speeds. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Chilling_Howl.shortHelp: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Moderate DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed, -Fly
Chilling_Howl.targetHelp: You're suffering cold damage over time and have your movement and recharge rate reduced slightly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Freezing_Roar.help: The Dire Wolf breathes out freezing air in a broad cone in front of it chilling all foes for Moderate Cold damage and lingering Cold Damage over time. Affected foes will also have their movement and attack speeds reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Freezing_Roar.targetHelp: You're suffering cold damage over time and have your movement and recharge rate reduced slightly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Maiming_Bite.help: The beast lunges and sinks their teeth into the victim before tearing viciously. Maiming Bite causes Moderate Lethal damage and reduces the target's movement speed moderately for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Bite.targetHelp: You're bleeding from the Vicious Bite.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Train_Beasts.help: Your Dire Wolf has been trained, it can now use Maiming Bite and Chilling Howl.

Terrible_Howl.help: The Dire Wolf is capable of letting out a Terrible Roar that will cause High Cold damage, slow and terrorize all nearby foes for a short time. Recharge: Long
Terrible_Howl.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG(Cold), Foe Terrorize, Minor DoT(Cold), -Rech, -Speed

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Will_of_the_Wild.help: When the Dire Wolf is dangerously low on health it will become enraged and suffer significantly less damage for a short time as well as recovering a portion of its health. Once this power wears off it will leave it partially drained of endurance. Recharge: Very Long

Tame_Beasts.help: Your Dire Wolf has been tamed it can now use Terrible Howl and Will of the Wild.
